message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you. Given its value to you, I understand it might be worth $15000 to you. Considering this and my company's profit margins, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this product for $14000. This is a special offer tailored to your needs and could potentially save you $1000 compared to the market value. I look forward to your positive response.
